features.keyMilestones: Public beta extending GitHub Copilot to more development environments with third-party integrations
Copilot Chat can search across repositories, organizations, and teams for comprehensive code discovery
Content exclusion beta extended to non-Git files for enhanced control over Copilot access
Expanded context window for better code completion requests
Free public beta chat functionality for individual subscriptions

features.featureCapability: GitHub Copilot Metrics API Generally Available
features.keyMilestones: GA release with new metrics for PR summaries, Chat on GitHub.com, and 28 days historical data
Improved multiline suggestions for JavaScript, TypeScript, Python
/test command detects testing framework and generates appropriate tests
Chat references previous messages for better context
Command line assistance for explaining commands and suggesting tasks
Integration with GitHub Actions for automated code generation, testing, and deployment workflows
Significantly expanded context window for better understanding of large codebases and complex projects
Improved cross-language context awareness for polyglot projects and microservices architectures
Advanced GPT model variant providing enhanced performance for complex coding tasks
Create feature flags, check logs, access API docs, deploy apps via natural language across third-party tools
Improved Last Activity calculation reflecting actual user engagement rather than token generation
Repository indexing reduced from 5 minutes to seconds across all Copilot tiers with unlimited repository support
Command line assistance for all Individual, Business, and Enterprise customers
Enhanced instruction following and performance improvements across all IDEs
Automated code review assistance with suggestions for improvements, security issues, and best practices
Enhanced prompt customization capabilities for specialized coding workflows and domain-specific tasks
Centralized enterprise endpoint for listing Copilot seats and metadata with read:enterprise scope
Published SOC 2 Type I report for Copilot Business showcasing security controls
Copilot Business and Enterprise included in GitHub's ISO 27001 certification
Copilot Chat can answer questions about repositories, releases, commits, and changes on GitHub.com
Copilot can summarize GitHub discussions and identify themes from participant commentary
Copilot answers questions about Pull Requests and provides overviews of introduced changes
Copilot can analyze files and retrieve recent changes on any branch for codebase understanding
Enhanced context awareness across multiple repositories within an organization for better code suggestions
Comprehensive usage analytics and adoption metrics for enterprise customers with team insights
Beta program allowing enterprises to fine-tune Copilot on their proprietary codebases
Public beta allowing enterprise customers to select Copilot plans per organization
Limited public beta of conversational coding for business users
Enhanced content exclusions with performance optimizations and multi-IDE support
Advanced AI offering with codebase understanding, knowledge bases, PR summaries, and Bing search
Public beta feature allowing Copilot to search Bing for information outside its general knowledge
Enhanced PR summaries with "Summary" and "Outline" sections for better code review comprehension

features.featureCapability: Copilot Chat on GitHub.com Generally Available
features.keyMilestones: Enhanced repository indexing with unlimited repositories for improved chat responses across all Copilot plans
2000 monthly code completions and 50 chat messages with Claude 3.5 Sonnet across VS Code, Visual Studio, JetBrains, and GitHub.com
Copilot Chat upgraded to GPT-4 for more accurate and useful code suggestions
Public beta of code matching across billions of GitHub files with license information in console log
Specialized expert agents with @ symbol for specific tasks, replacing slash commands
AI-generated commit messages based on pending changes via sparkle action in VS Code
Enhanced code explanations with symbol implementation integration for better precision
Copilot coding agent now supports AGENTS.md custom instructions alongside existing .github/copilot-instructions.md formats for enhanced project-specific guidance
macOS Raycast extension enabling task delegation to Copilot coding agent with progress tracking, supporting Pro/Pro+, Business, and Enterprise plans
Public preview feature enabling creation of parent issues with sub-issues, breaking down complex work into component parts via natural language prompts

features.featureCapability: Enterprise Cloud Data Residency for Coding Agent
features.keyMilestones: Copilot coding agent now available in GitHub Enterprise Cloud with data residency, supporting autonomous background development tasks

xAI's Grok Code Fast 1 available in public preview for VS Code with complimentary access through September 2, 2025, supporting BYOK integration
Revolutionary knowledge bases with enhanced context and team collaboration replacing deprecated knowledge bases
Sunset in favor of Copilot Spaces with enhanced functionality and improved user experience
Anthropic's flagship model with enhanced reasoning capabilities for complex programming tasks
AI-powered commit message generation integrated into GitHub workflow for improved developer productivity
Flexible billing system allowing users to exceed monthly limits with pay-per-use pricing for additional requests
Deep integration with GitHub Advanced Security for vulnerability detection and remediation suggestions
Early access mobile application for code review, chat, and basic editing capabilities on iOS and Android
Fine-tune Copilot on proprietary libraries, specialized languages, and internal coding patterns for Enterprise
Usage metrics for GitHub Organization Teams with five or more Copilot license holders
Comprehensive security, privacy, compliance, and transparency hub
Shows repositories and licenses when suggestions match public code
REST API for managing Copilot for Business subscriptions
Official graduation from beta with C, C++, Kotlin, and Swift support
Share Copilot chat sessions via links instead of screenshots
AI-generated commit messages integrated into GitHub Desktop workflow
Lightweight reasoning model providing faster performance for GitHub Copilot and GitHub Models

Enterprise customers can set default instructions for all organization users
Advanced reasoning model surpassing O1 on coding benchmarks, graduated from preview to GA with IP indemnification

features.featureCapability: Claude 3.7 Sonnet and Gemini Flash 2.0 Generally Available
